about_the_game: In this five-part series by David Annandale, glimpse the terrors of the Shadowlands as recorded by a samurai known only as Eihi. Read or listen to the five-part short story leading up to the plot of Shadowveil: Legend of The Five Rings!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 64-bit
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 2500 / AMD FX-4350 or equivalent
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1070 / AMD RX 580 with 6GB of VRAM or equivalent
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: Ability to open PDFs and MP3s
